title: Riot refuses to give my account back,
body:
My account on euw was hacked 3 days ago and riot refuses to give it back to me after spending over 200â‚¬ on it and reaching platinum 1.
I gave them everything that was needed,the email that the account was originally made and an RP code I used on the account.
What can I do?

replies.body: We take account recovery pretty seriously, and will absolutely help players regain access as long as we can verify ownership.  I was unable to locate any support tickets for you, and we prefer not to discuss sensitive account information on the boards.  If you have a ticket open, your first step towards account recovery would be verification of ownership.  I recommend checking out our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide in preparation of getting your account back.  Best of luck!
The hacker has been playing from my account for 4 days and still you dont seem to care
I made a ticket from another account called GRVet3ran0sS
yeah riot LOVES to take their time answering support tickets. i wouldnt expect any help from them. at least not anytime soon.
